Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the opening goal at the 10th minute
Jamal Musiala scored the second goal at the 19th minute
Kai Havertz scored a penalty to make it 3-0 in the 45th+1 minute
Niclas Füllkrug scored the fourth goal for Germany at the 68th minute
Emre Can scored the fifth goal for Germany at the 90+3 minute
Antonio Rüdiger scored an own goal for Scotland at the 87th minute
Ryan Porteous was sent off for Scotland at the 45th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Germany's manager praised his team's performance and their ability to control the game
Scotland's manager expressed disappointment with the team's performance and highlighted the need for improvement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany
The referee for the match was Clément Turpin
Others: The match was part of the Group Stage of the 2024 European Championship
The line for the match was GER -1.5 and the Over/Under was 2.5
